title: The U.S.’s 150-Year Job CRISIS!
description: Analyst Greg Mannarino says that the United States is in an epic 150-year job crisis. "They are admitting that we are losing jobs," he said, quoting Reuters. We have all felt the sting of inflation lately, and Mannarino says this is only the beginning.
